title: HubPDF
subtitle: PDF Tools Hub
meta_description: Complete PDF tools hub with secure processing and flexible plans
hero_description: Process your PDF files with maximum security, flexible plans, and intuitive interface. All files are automatically deleted after 30 minutes.
features_description: Everything you need to work with PDF files professionally
tools_description: Select the tool you need to process your PDF files
tool_merge_description: Combine multiple PDF files into a single document
tool_split_description: Split a PDF into multiple files by page ranges
tool_compress_description: Reduce PDF file size while maintaining quality
tool_pdf_to_images_description: Convert PDF pages to PNG, JPG or JPEG images
tool_images_to_pdf_description: Create a PDF from multiple images
tool_extract_text_description: Extract all text from a PDF file
security_description: Your files are processed with maximum security and privacy
security_encryption_description: All uploads are encrypted in transit
security_temporary_description: Files are automatically deleted after 30 minutes
security_privacy_description: We never store or share your documents
pricing_subtitle: Choose the perfect plan for your needs
pricing_description: Start free and upgrade as needed
upgrade_notice_description: Upgrade your plan for larger files, more operations, and no watermarks.
watermark_notice_description: Your next operations today will have watermarks. Upgrade your plan to remove them.
format_help: PNG offers better quality, JPG smaller files
merge_instruction_1: Select multiple PDF files to merge
merge_instruction_2: Files will be merged in the selected order
merge_instruction_3: Result will be a single PDF file
merge_instruction_4: Max file size per file depends on your plan
split_instruction_1: Select a PDF file to split
split_instruction_3: Each range will be a separate PDF file
split_instruction_4: Result will be a ZIP file with the PDFs
compress_instruction_1: Select a PDF file to compress
compress_instruction_2: File will be optimized for smaller size
compress_instruction_3: Quality will be preserved whenever possible
compress_instruction_4: Ideal for email sending or upload
pdf_to_images_instruction_1: Select a PDF file to convert
pdf_to_images_instruction_2: Each page will be converted to an image
pdf_to_images_instruction_3: Choose format: PNG for quality, JPG for size
pdf_to_images_instruction_4: Result will be a ZIP file with the images
images_to_pdf_instruction_2: Images will be organized into pages
images_to_pdf_instruction_4: Supported formats: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP
extract_text_instruction_1: Select a PDF file to extract text
extract_text_instruction_2: All readable text will be extracted
extract_text_instruction_3: Text in images will not be extracted
extract_text_instruction_4: Result will be a text file

payment_success_message: Your plan has been upgraded and is now active. Enjoy all the features!
next_step_2: Enjoy larger limits and no watermarks
next_step_3: Access the dashboard to see your new daily limit

continue_with_free: You can continue using the free plan:

pending_step_2: You'll receive an email when confirmed
pending_step_3: Your plan will be activated automatically
payment_method_description: Some methods may take up to 24h for confirmation.
manage_plan_description: View and manage your plan and billing
upgrade_benefits: Get larger files, more operations and priority support
business_plan_benefits: Get even more features with the Business plan
cancel_subscription_message: Are you sure you want to cancel? You'll lose access to premium features.
admin_dashboard_description: Manage users, subscriptions and view statistics
confirm_reset_quota: Are you sure you want to reset this user's daily quota?
confirm_promote_user: Are you sure you want to promote this user to administrator?
confirm_cancel_subscription: Are you sure you want to cancel this subscription?
about_subtitle: Professional PDF tools with security first
about_description_1: HubPDF is a complete platform for PDF file processing tools, developed with a focus on security, privacy and ease of use.
about_mission_description: To provide secure and efficient PDF tools for professionals and businesses, ensuring that your documents are processed with maximum privacy and quality.
about_security_description: All files are processed locally and automatically deleted. We never store or share your documents.
privacy_section_1_content: We collect only the information necessary to provide our services, including email, name and payment information.
privacy_section_2_content: Your information is used exclusively to provide and improve our services. We never sell or share personal data.
privacy_section_3_content: We implement advanced security measures to protect your information, including encryption and automatic file deletion.
privacy_section_4_content: We use cookies only for essential functionality such as authentication and language preferences.
privacy_section_5_content: Files are automatically deleted after 30 minutes. Account data is kept only while your account is active.
privacy_contact_content: For privacy questions, contact us through the
terms_section_1_content: By using HubPDF, you agree to these terms of service and our privacy policy.
terms_section_2_content: You may use our services for legal PDF document processing. Use for illegal or malicious content is prohibited.
terms_section_3_content: We provide the service 'as is'. We are not responsible for data loss or damages resulting from use of the service.
terms_section_4_content: Payments are processed monthly. Refunds are evaluated case by case within 30 days.
terms_section_5_content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be communicated by email.
terms_contact_content: For questions about the terms of service, contact us through the
contact_hours_content: Monday to Friday, 9 AM to 6 PM (Brazil time)
contact_support_content: Response within 24 hours for Pro and Business users
faq_answer_1: All files are encrypted during upload and processing, and are automatically deleted after 30 minutes.
faq_question_2: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
faq_answer_2: Yes, you can cancel your subscription anytime through the control panel.
faq_answer_3: Plans differ in maximum file size, daily operations count, and watermark presence.
faq_question_4: How does the trial period work?
faq_answer_4: You can test all Pro plan features for 7 days for free.
